data.title: Brain Blast Quiz
data.meta_description: Once you reach Academia 4XX AF, you'll discover a familiar face. In the northern section of the map near where you find Hope, use Mog to uncover a hidden
data.text:
Once you reach Academia 4XX AF, you'll discover a familiar face. In the northern section of the map near where you find Hope, use Mog to uncover a hidden character named Captain Cryptic. Serah comments on how he looks remarkable similar to Amodar, Lightning's Captain from XIII.

Once you answer one of his questions correctly, he will rewards you with a Fragment before disappearing to another location in the level. You can gain 5 Fragments from finding him around Academia and answering his questions.

There are also numerous quiz stations scattered throughout Academia that give out Fragments for answering 10 questions correctly in a row. These questions range from basic knowledge of the Final Fantasy XIII universe to rather random queries you have to use monster knowledge to pick and choose from.

What is the name of the Gran Pulse paradise created from nothing but a poet's dreams?

What is the best act of the circus troupe the Circus Riders, a group of acrobats who use airbikes for dangerous stunts?Chicken Race

In 1 AF, an old flanbanero flower was discovered in crystal. The Color was a cross between crystal and flanbanero. What was the color? Muddy Violet

Which of the following cannot be found in New Bodhum?Active volcanos
